title: Weapon Traits
content:
Trait NameEffect Description
ShatterTargets do not benefit from shields when defending against this weapon.
- Ideal for disrupting defensive formations.
FlurryFor each Critical Hit, the target suffers 1 Wound.
- This represents a pinpoint strike—through eye socket, exposed joint, or corrupted heart—that ignores conventional defenses.
PiercingFor each Critical Hit, the target suffers –1 to their Save against that attack.
- Useful for piercing heavier armor with precision.
CrushingIf all Hit rolls succeed, the target is Knocked Prone.
- A display of unrelenting pressure or technique.
ImpaleIf this model charged before making the attack, it gains +1 Attack Dice.
- Rewards aggressive movement.
BlastAlso, resolve a full attack sequence against all other models within 2" of that target, including friendly models. Each affected model is treated as if it were directly attacked.
- Blast weapons are powerful but risky in close quarters.
CleaveOn a Critical Hit, the attack deals 1 additional damage.
- A powerful strike that cuts deeper than expected.
KnockdownOn a Critical Hit, the target is knocked Prone.
- A forceful impact that sends the target sprawling.
PierceOn a Critical Hit, the attack ignores the target's Save.
- A precise strike that finds its way through any defense.
RendOn a Critical Hit, the target's Toughness is reduced by 1 for the rest of the game.
- A brutal wound that weakens the target's resilience.
SweepOn a Critical Hit, the attack can target an additional enemy within 1" of the original target.
- A wide swing that catches multiple opponents.
ViciousOn a Critical Hit, the attack deals 2 additional damage.
- A particularly brutal strike that causes severe wounds.
